body_html: I'm not quite sure what your issue is. If you think problem is with nvidia-docker file an issue at nvidia-docker https://github.com/NVIDIA/nvidia-docker, if you think base images are faulty file an issue at https://gitlab.com/nvidia/cuda/. Docker image should not depend on host OS environment variables.

body: I'm not quite sure what your issue is. If you think problem is with nvidia-docker file an issue at nvidia-docker https://github.com/NVIDIA/nvidia-docker, if you think base images are faulty file an issue at https://gitlab.com/nvidia/cuda/. Docker image should not depend on host OS environment variables.
